text.content: María looked in the mirror before her school date.
She only had 20 minutes before class.
Desperate, she grabbed a rag with light color flowers to cover her hair.
She ran upstairs to check her pony tail But it looked out of place.
Her brother Carlos laughed from the doorway.
María felt envious of boys' just needed water to fix their hair.
She unwrapped the rag quickly Brushing her hair.
It wasn't perfect, but better than the flowery cover.
She ran to school, hoping no one would notice.
